data.description:
Default property that provides detailed product data. Called on the default `templates/pages/product.html` and `templates/pages/amp/product.html` templates, and on several partials in the `templates/components/` subdirectory:

`account/returns-list.html`,
`cart/item-options.html`,
`products/add-to-cart.html`,
`products/event-date.html`,
`products/modals/writeReview.html`,
`products/price.html`,
`products/product-view.html`,
`amp/products/product-options.html`,
`amp/products/product-view.html`, and
`amp/products/product-view-details.html`.

**Handlebars Expression** {{product}}

add_to_wishlist_url.description: URL to add the product to the customer’s wishlist

brand.description: The company, product line, or trademark associated with the product.

name.description: The name of the company, product line, or trademark.

url.description: The store's internal page with all the products from that brand.

bulk_discount_rates.description: List of discount rates for the current product

can_purchase.description: Boolean that indicates whether the product is available for purchase

cart_url.description: URL to the customer’s shopping cart

customizations.description: Product customizations (for example, a T-shirt size); these correspond to configurable fields and numeric-text product options in the BigCommerce control panel

detail_messages.description: Status messages for display at the top of the product page

gift_wrapping_available.description: Whether or not gift wrapping is enabled

gtin.description: Global Trade Item Number. An identifier for trade items that is incorporated into several product identification standards, such as ISBN, UPC, and EAN.

images.description: List of all images for this product, in Stencil image format (as configured in config.json; used with the getImage Handlebars helper)

main_image.description: Primary image to display when the product details page loads

max_purchase_quantity.description: Maximum quantity that can be purchased at once

meta_keywords.description: Optional search keywords that merchants may enter in the control panel’s "Add a Product" or “Edit a Product” page, to characterize the product in meta tags and storefront searches

min_purchase_quantity.description: Minimum quantity that can be purchased at once

mpn.description: Manufacturer Part Number. It is used to reference and identify a product.

num_reviews.description: Number of reviews the product has

allOf.description: product.price and products[*].price object available to various product templates and components.

formatted.description: string representation of the price, including currency formatting

value.type: raw numeric value of the above price

low_stock_level.description: If inventory tracking is turned on: Sets a threshold low-stock level. You can use conditional logic to display a "limited availability" badge if the stock_levelproperty's value falls below this threshold. If inventory tracking is turned off: A "null" string.

stock_level.description: If inventory tracking is turned on: The number of items available for sale (0 or more). If inventory tracking is turned off: A "null" string.

sku.description: Default product variant when no options are selected

tags.description: Keywords by which this product can also be identified

upc.description: Optional UPC code for the product

warranty.description: Optional warranty text set by the merchant
